Uses of Package
peril.views.slick.components.menus

  • Packages that use peril.views.slick.components.menus 
    Package Description
    peril.views.slick.components.menus  
    peril.views.slick.helpers  
  • Classes in peril.views.slick.components.menus used by peril.views.slick.components.menus 
    Class and Description
    HelpMenu.HelpPage
    A page on the HelpMenu that links to a next and previous HelpMenu.HelpPage.
    Menu
    Encapsulates the behaviour of a menu that can be displayed in a InteractiveState.
    PauseMenu.Toggle
    Holds "ON" and "OFF" which has boolean value assigned to them.
    UpgradeMenu.UnitTrader
    A object that when clicked upgrades the specified ModelUnit to the ModelUnit above it in terms of strength.
    WarMenu.Dice
    Handles displaying the dice on the screen.
    WarMenu.SlickSquad
    Displays a ModelSquad to the user.
    WarMenu.SlickSquadMember
    Displays a ModelSquadMember to the user.
  • Classes in peril.views.slick.components.menus used by peril.views.slick.helpers 
    Class and Description
    Menu
    Encapsulates the behaviour of a menu that can be displayed in a InteractiveState.
